case.name: Clothes in a Hot Spring
case.description: Misty expresses confusion at why everyone is wearing clothes in a Hot Spring.

case.name: Skinny Dipping
case.description: Misty suggests that everyone go skinny dipping after the game.

case.name: No Men
case.description: Misty displays annoyance at the lack of men playing the game.

case.name: Ask for Number
case.description: While naked, Misty will ask the male player (you) for their phone number.

case.name: Ask for Number2
case.description: Misty has gotten the player's number without losing the round.

case.name: Ask for Number3
case.description: Misty has gotten the player's number, but has also lost the round and must masturbate.

notes.note: This case was hidden due to no longer making sense after changes were made to the targeted character. If you're rewriting this character, feel free to delete it.

markers.marker: Misty asks a male player for his number. This occurs while she is naked, but has yet to lose.
A male player has agreed to exchange phone numbers with Misty.
